name: Zombie Battle Royal
description:
The world has gone in to chaos. Zombies walk the dead lands for human meat. People have become greedy and resources are rear. Toxic barrels are every were - killing all the life around it.

You are an ex-military soldier from the yellow-caps. You and some other people find a apple tree forest with lodes of resources, but not for all of you. And to add to the problem - zombies are being lured here by the smell of apples and brains.

You MUST be the last man alive in the apple tree woods! Good Luck, Soldier!
